tuv.seg: Advice on contraception and prescriptions for contraceptive drugs and devices are provided by GPs, voluntary organisations and specialist private family planning clinics
Soláthraíonn LGanna, eagraíochtaí deonacha agus clinicí speisialaithe pleanála príobháidí clainne comhairle ar fhrithghiniúint agus oidis do dhrugaí agus fearais fhrithghiniúnacha
The Crisis Pregnancy Programme provides the website thinkcontraception.ie for information about contraceptive options and services
Soláthraíonn an Clár um Thoircheas Géarchéime an láithreán gréasáin thinkcontraception.ie chun faisnéis a thabhairt faoi roghanna agus seirbhísí frithghiniúnacha
If you have a medical card, you are entitled to free GP services including contraceptive advice and prescriptions for contraceptive drugs and devices
Má tá cárta leighis agat, tá tú i dteideal seirbhísí saor in aisce LG a fháil, lena n-áirítear comhairle ar fhrithghiniúint agus oidis do dhrugaí agus d’fhearais fhrithghiniúnacha
If you do not have a medical card, the costs of contraceptive drugs and devices may be included in the subsidy arrangements for prescribed drugs and medicines
Mura bhfuil cárta leighis agat, is féidir costais drugaí agus fearas frithghiniúnach a chur san áireamh sna socruithe fóirdheontais do dhrugaí agus cógais fhorordaithe
Voluntary and private family planning clinics also provide contraceptive services
Soláthraíonn clinicí deonacha agus príobháideacha pleanála clainne seirbhísí frithghiniúnacha, chomh maith
The voluntary providers usually have charges but may waive them or have lower fees in certain cases
Is gnách go ngearrann na soláthraithe deonacha muirir, ach féadtar iad a tharscaoileadh i roinnt cásanna
There is no set minimum age in Ireland at which contraceptive advice and prescriptions may be provided
Níl aon aois íosta sheasta ann in Éirinn ag ar féidir comhairle agus oidis fhrithghiniúnacha a sholáthar

The age of consent to sexual activity is 17 and it may be a criminal offence to have sex with a person under the age of 17. This means that providers of contraceptive services are entitled to refuse to provide those services to people under 17
Ciallaíonn seo go bhfuil soláthraithe seirbhísí frithghiniúnacha i dteideal a dhiúltú na seirbhísí siúd a sholáthar do dhaoine faoi 17 mbliana
In general the age of consent for health services purposes is 16
Go ginearálta, is é 16 bliana aois an toilithe do sheirbhísí seirbhísí sláinte
The decision to have a sterilisation operation for family planning purposes is a matter for the patient in consultation with their doctor or specialist
Ceist don othar, i gcomhairle lena ndochtúir nó speisialtóir is ea an cinneadh chun dul faoi obráid steirilithe ar mhaithe le cuspóirí pleanála clainne
Your entitlement to free services is the same as for public hospital services generally
Is ionann an teidlíocht a bhíonn agat do sheirbhísí saor in aisce agus do sheirbhísí ospidéil phoiblí go ginearálta
These procedures are also available in some private hospitals, where the full cost is payable
Tá na nósanna imeachta seo ar fáil, i roinnt ospidéil phríobháideacha, sa chás go bhfuil an costas iomlán iníoctha
A crisis pregnancy is an unplanned pregnancy that represents a personal crisis for the pregnant woman
Is éard is toircheas géarchéime ná toircheas neamhphleanáilte arb ionann é agus géarchéim phearsanta don bhean thorrach
The Crisis Pregnancy Programme aims to reduce the number of crisis pregnancies by the provision of education, advice and contraceptive services
Tá de chuspóir ag an gClár Toircheas Géarchéime an líon toirchis ghéarchéime a laghdú trí oideachas, comhairle agus seirbhísí frithghiniúnacha a sholáthar
It also funds crisis pregnancy counselling services
Chomh maith leis sin, cistíonn sé seirbhísí comhairleoireachta toirchis
Information about these services is available at positiveoptions.ie
Tá fáil ar fhaisnéis faoi na seirbhísí seo ar positiveoptions.ie
Abortion is illegal in Ireland except where there is a real and substantial risk to the life of the mother
Tá ginmhilleadh in aghaidh an dlí in Éirinn, seachas nuair is baol fíor agus mór do shaol na máthar
This includes a risk arising from a threat of suicide
Áirítear leis seo baol a eascraíonn ó bhagairt féinmharaithe
The Protection of Life During Pregnancy Act 2013 sets out the law in this area and the Department of Health has issued guidelines for health professionals
Leagtar amach san Acht um Chosaint na Beatha le linn Toirchis, 2013 conas a d’eisigh an dlí sa limistéar seo agus an Roinn Sláinte treoirlínte do ghairmithe sláinte
Women in Ireland may not be prevented from travelling abroad to get an abortion
Ní féidir cosc a chur ar mhná in Éirinn ó thaisteal thar lear go dtabharfar faoi ghinmhilleadh orthu
It is lawful to provide information about abortion abroad, subject to strict conditions
Tá sé ar aon dul leis an dlí chun faisnéis a sholáthar faoi ghinmhilleadh thar lear, faoi réir coinníollacha diana
It is not lawful to encourage or advocate an abortion in individual circumstances
Tá sé in aghaidh an dlí chun ginmhilleadh a spreagadh nó chun tacú leis faoi chúinsí aonair
